issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Fix or delete fuzzit jobs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7712](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7712). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not sure we need them now that we're using the OSS-Fuzz project, but they're broken.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7712?focusedCommentId=17025721) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I think the fuzzit setup is handled by [~marco.neumann.by]. Personally I will focus on OSS-Fuzz.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7712?focusedCommentId=17025739) by Marco Neumann (marco.neumann.by):*
`[~apitrou]` I think we should focus on a single solution. I don't have a very strong opinion on that. Fuzzit was nice because they approached me and offered their solution including some assistance, but OSS-fuzz is the de facto standard for OSS.
